documentation.text:
@notice Standard function to validate follow NFT ownership. This module is agnostic to follow NFT token IDs
 and other properties.

@notice Standard function to validate follow NFT ownership. This module is agnostic to follow NFT token IDs
 and other properties.

params.followNFTTokenId: The token ID of the follow NFT being transferred.
params.from: The address sending the follow NFT.
params.profileId: The token ID of the profile associated with the follow NFT being transferred.
params.to: The address receiving the follow NFT.

params.data: Arbitrary data passed by the profile creator.
params.profileId: The token ID of the profile to initialize this follow module for.

returns._0: bytes The encoded data to emit in the hub.

params.data: Arbitrary data passed by the follower.
params.profileId: The token ID of the profile being followed.

followModuleTransferHook(uint256,address.notice: This is a transfer hook that is called upon follow NFT transfer in `beforeTokenTransfer. This can only be called from the LensHub contract. NOTE: Special care needs to be taken here: It is possible that follow NFTs were issued before this module was initialized if the profile's follow module was previously different. This transfer hook should take this into consideration, especially when the module holds state associated with individual follow NFTs.

initializeFollowModule(uint256,bytes).notice: Initializes a follow module for a given Lens profile. This can only be called by the hub contract.

isFollowing(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Standard function to validate follow NFT ownership. This module is agnostic to follow NFT token IDs and other properties.

processFollow(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Processes a given follow, this can only be called from the LensHub contract.

userdoc.notice: This abstract contract adds the default expected behavior for follow validation in a follow module to inheriting contracts.
